name: Detective Pikachu™
description:
Detective Pikachu is on the case!

Put your detective hat on – it’s time to crack the case of a boy’s missing father in Detective Pikachu, a unique adventure game filled with beloved Pokémon.

Follow the story of Tim Goodman, an 18-year-old university student with a strong sense of justice, and form an unlikely partnership with a peculiar talking Pikachu! Gather evidence, interview witnesses, and piece together a variety of clues to unravel the many mysteries surrounding Ryme City.

This game also supports Japanese

Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
